Posts.Content: Sep 23, 2010 12:44PM Lulubelle wrote: My LE therapist has been using ktape on me and it seems to be quite effective and usually stays on for about 3 days after the manual lymph drainage treatment, then I go back to wearing my sleeve.  I may even ask her if it would help to apply over my chest area after my next tissue expander fill (I just started the reconstruction process).  Might help with the muscle inflammation and lymph flow in those areas?  I will post again after I ask about that.  My LE therapist is great, she doesn't just jump on any new bandwagon, she researches and where necessary, becomes certified. Another tool in the LE treatment kit is good news, when used correctly, of course. :)
Posts.Title: kinesiotape - interesting SleeveNinja Lulubelle
